    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1808</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Effekt</string>
            <string language="en">Power</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potencia</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Elektrisk effekt. Hvor mye kan du skru på før sikringene ryker? Prøv!</string>
            <string language="en">Electrical power. How many light switches can you turn on before the fuse go ? Try!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">effekt</string>
            <string language="en">power</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">sikringer</string>
            <string language="en">fuses</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Energie. Wieviele helle Schalter 
können Sie einschalten, bevor die Sicherung gehen? Versuch!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant électrique. Combien de commutateurs 
légers pouvez-vous mettre en marche avant que le fusible 
disparaissent ? Essai !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potência elétrica. Quantos interruptores 
claros pode você girar sobre antes que o fusível vá? 
Tentativa!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente elettrica. Quanti interruttori 
chiari potete accendere prima che il fusibile vada? Prova!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική δύναμη. Πόσους ελαφριούς διακόπτες 
μπορείτε να ανοίξετε πριν από τη θρυαλλίδα πηγαίνετε; 
Προσπαθήστε!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente eléctrica. ¿Cuántos 
interruptores ligeros puede usted girar antes de que vaya el fusible? 
¡Intento!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicherungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">puissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
